welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Flint, where history and beauty meet. Known for its stunning castle and picturesque surroundings, we invite you to explore and indulge in all this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: Harun's Kebab House
restaurants.description: Harun's Kebab House is a pizzeria located in Flint.

restaurants.name: Sayers the Bakers
restaurants.description: Sayers the Bakers is a bakery located in Flint.

restaurants.description: Raj Balti is a indian restaurant located in Flint.

restaurants.description: The Boathouse is a gastropub located in Parkgate.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 4 hours.
